extendedInfo.description: You've booked a trip to your favorite getaway but the plane is full and you're stuck in the middle seat, sound familiar? Let Seat AlertsÂ® by ExpertFlyer help find you a better seat in 3 easy steps:1. Look up the Seat Map of your flight.2. Set up a Seat Alert to find window seats, aisle seats and more.3. Get notified if your preferred seat is found.Seat Alerts will monitor the available seats right up until the flight departs. If it becomes available you can change your seat when your Seat Alert notification arrives, just contact the airline or the travel agency that booked your ticket. Seat Alerts finds a window or aisle seat better than 75% of the time.â¢ With a Free account, you can set up one Seat Alert at a time using the Any Seat, Any Window or Any Aisle options.â¢ Seat maps include SeatGuruÂ® seat ratings so you know which seat is the right seat for you. Just click on a seat to see its rating and review.â¢ If you need multiple Seat Alerts at the same time, additional alerts and alert options are available for purchase.â¢ Supports over 140 airlines that have preassigned seating.Note: Physical seat availability has nothing to do with Award, Upgrade, or fare ticket inventory. Please read our FAQ for more information: http://www.expertflyer.com/expertflyer-support-faqâ¢ If you have questions about using the app, please email us first or see the in-app FAQ page.Also works with ExpertFlyer.com Basic and Premium subscriptions.

reviews.title: good application
reviews.comment: Got me out of a middle seat! Well worth it to sit in front of the plane.  Free alerts are great too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No seat plans
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t have any seat plans for any of the 4 uk airlines I use.
reviews.author: ray heslop

reviews.title: Good mobile addition to the web feature
reviews.comment: This is a useful real-time addition to the web app seat alert feature as I may not check my mail as often to see an alert has been triggered.  Thanks for adding it!
reviews.author: Doug Light

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: Its a free app, however it costs .99 per alert. Not a big deal as it could be well worth it. My problem is that it alerted me about a seat and by the time I got there it was no longer available. Now they want to charge another .99 cents to reestablish the alert.
reviews.author: Mike Kuchesky

reviews.title: Good concept, poorly executed
reviews.comment: The app won\'t let me specify premium seats only. I want an aisle seat in United Economy Plus on an international flight The app says there are aisle seats available, but they are on regular economy. This is the case even when I click the Premium Only checkbox in options. Note I do have premium status on United. Also no place to save American Airlines FF numbers. Also the seat availability data didn\'t seem to match what I found on UAs web site. Also I found the workflows to be not quite intuitive...had to search for how to specify premium only seats, for example. Finally, seems to force restart the app most times when I launch it, and I once got a very peculiar error related to a null pointer reference or some such.
reviews.author: Rob Schultz

reviews.title: Unable to save favourites
reviews.comment: No way of saving the returned flight search results (not alerts!). Also, the search result does not provide the flight time & type of aircraft eg. A380-800 or B747-400 - so one is not entirely sure if it\'s the right flight!
reviews.author: Eric Im

reviews.title: Nice idea, shame you have to pay after 1 alert
reviews.comment: This is a handy tool, though you have to pay to set more than one alert at a time, or for alerts for specific seats (only general aisle and window alerts are free).  It\'s not the prettiest or slickest app - the graphics are pretty poor - but it is functional.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Viscomi

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Why do I have to fill forms to check seat maps? It doesn\'t work. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Ed F

reviews.title: Not as advertised!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work as advertised. Cancellation instructions don\'t match the application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Stuff
reviews.comment: A truly unique app. Thanks for something very uiseful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: What a great idea; works exactly as described.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Using a Galaxy nexus, the app looks great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alert
reviews.comment: My wife\'s seat alerted me that she was about to pass gas so I twisted all the vents on and bailed out for a restroom break. She\'s got a bad diet. Too many Churchy Wafers. (tm)
reviews.author: Shuck N. Jive

reviews.title: What the?
reviews.comment: App has closed and re-opened the five times I\'ve tried to use it. Didn\'t locate the four flights I\'m booked on next week. Maybe another time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: great application if it works on Samsung SIII phone.
reviews.author: van vlaanderen ben
